scripts.saddle:compile: env network=${1:-"development"} && echo mkdir -p .build/${network} && echo solc --combined-json bin,abi --optimize contracts/*.sol > .build/${network}/build.json
scripts.saddle:deploy: env network=${1:-"development"} && env contract="$2" && shift && shift && yarn run saddle:compile && node ./.tsbuilt/deploy.js $@
scripts.test: env network=${1:-"test"} && yarn run saddle:compile && yarn run saddle:test:run
